A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
There were a few cool scenes\, such as the fight in Snoke's room.  But there are so many nail-on-chalkboard scenes that they overshadowed the decent parts.

I liked Kylo Ren better than I did in The Force Awakens.  I am looking forward to seeing him progress more in the next movie too.  I also liked Rey but wish we got a different look into her backstory than what we were given.  It just didn't seem to jive with the direction that TFA was going.  Again\, maybe we'll get more in the next movie.

If they were to take out the social commentary and omit Rose and all her scenes from this movie\, I would give it another 2 or 3 stars.
